name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Experienced Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of proficiency in **Kotlin**, **Spring Boot**, and **PostgreSQL**. I excel in building high-performance backend solutions that support scalable applications, leveraging my deep knowledge of **AWS**, **CI/CD** practices, and robust software development methodologies. My background in product management allows me to effectively communicate and align technological goals with business objectives. 
Additionally, I have a solid foundation in full-stack development with **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, and an adeptness for cloud environments including **Azure** and **AWS**. Successfully led the creation of enterprise-grade systems incorporating AI/ML for predictive analytics and real-time data processing while ensuring compliance with standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. I am skilled in microservices architecture and have hands-on experience developing machine learning pipelines with tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
